attributes.action: A public vote of no confidence in the British government
attributes.additional_details: With the governments who have continuously failed the British public for the last 50 years we need to make sure this can never happen again
attributes.background: We want the government to allow the public  decide we have no confidence in parliament and house of Lords. Resulting in a full ban of allowing these people to be in a position of power ever again.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
